preclusion: No formal/official preclusion. However, if you are (very) familiar with R or with other statistical tools; this may mean you have had considerable quantitative-analysis training and this elective may not be as beneficial for you. If in doubt, you can drop me an email to discuss and determine the extent to which this module is worth (or not) your while.
description:
To provide participants with basic understanding of the marketing research process and the scientific approach to information identification, collection and analysis for marketing decision-making. 
To provide participants with the opportunity to design and execute a marketing research project.

To provide students with opportunities to examine, understand and interpret marketing research information.
title: Research for Marketing Insights
prerequisite: At the risk of stating the obvious, a personal mobile computing device with R/RStudio installed is absolutely required in class to follow and replicate the various statistical analyses during class.
